short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that takes you to Evreward's page for the store you are visting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension places a clickable icon next to your Chrome search box that opens Evreward's page for the store you're currently browsing, giving you quick access to the coupons, promo codes, cash back rebates, rewards and discount gift cards available.
